amendment.description: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds to implement the COVID19 Workplace Safety Plan issued by the Department of Agriculture.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
